__e: So, uh, Chip, we don't need you anymore.
You're gone. The chip's gone. Get out of my head.

If he dies, so does the chip and everything on it.
Sucks he's chipped. He was a good guy to road trip with.
Ever since you... Ever since you chipped me and sent me here... Believe it or not, life is a lot more normal than it had been.
You can't just go, in my head I've got a chip Type II.
A surveillance microchip. A device they put on me to see if I'm here, or here, or if I do this... or if I do that.

Chip's been pretty crazed at work himself.

I gotta get going I just came for the ship I was left with you
